title: Flexible Self-Directed Learning Design for Nursing Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, strengthening language communication competencies for nurse managers/leaders within organizations

learning_goals: Learners can design team communication improvement strategies through weekly 2-hour online discussions and one 3-hour on-site workshop, utilizing self-determination theory-based learning strategies.
Learners can submit a project report analyzing three cases of language barriers in workplace settings by integrating mobile learning platforms and face-to-face sessions within five days.
Learners can demonstrate self-directed learning capabilities by achieving over 80% of individual/team learning goals using flexible learning schedule management tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
